faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Learn more about how our AI-powered multimodal educational game works.
faq.stillHaveQuestions: Still have questions? We're here to help.

item1.question: How does the AI customize content for each learner?
item1.answer: Our AI analyzes interaction patterns, including response time, error types, and engagement levels. It then generates content that addresses specific learning needs while maintaining educational objectives.

item2.question: Is internet connectivity required to use the game?
item2.answer: Initial content packages can be downloaded for offline use, but continuous AI adaptation and fresh content generation requires an internet connection.

item3.question: What subjects and age groups is the game suitable for?
item3.answer: The platform is designed to be adaptable across subjects from elementary to higher education. Content difficulty and presentation automatically adjust based on user interactions.

item4.question: How is user privacy protected when the AI is learning from interactions?
item4.answer: All learning data is anonymized and processed with strict privacy controls. Personal information is never shared, and parents/educators can control data collection settings.

item5.question: Can educators customize the learning objectives?
item5.answer: Yes, educators can set specific learning goals, and the AI will generate content to meet these objectives while maintaining its adaptive approach to each student's needs.
